title: Portfolio WebSite
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills, built with modern web technologies like TypeScript and Next.js, and deployed on Vercel. This site serves as a central hub for my professional work, including detailed project showcases, code samples, and an overview of my technical expertise.

title: SQL_Injection
description: A comprehensive site on SQL Injection vulnerabilities, their impact on web applications, and strategies for prevention, including practical implementation in a secure web application.
